name: Super Kawaii Ninja
description:
The great slime king and his army attacking japan, the country is on high alert and only one person can save it, the kawaii ninja.


Super kawaii ninja is a single player arena fps.

In each level you will have to save the peoples of the city within a given time while fighting the ordes of slimes.


During the game you will earn money to increase your abilities.

As you advance in game you will unlock new levels and game modes.
